title: Data Request
description: An inbox message requesting specific data from a user

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Database filter the data must match

userSelect.title: User selects the data
userSelect.description: Should the user select the data to be returned?

userSelectLimit.title: User select limit
userSelectLimit.description: Limit the number of data records the user can return. Limit is optional.

alternativeAction.title: Alternative action
alternativeAction.description: An alternative action to take if the user does not have the requested data

url.title: URL
url.description: The user will be redirected to this URL if they decide to use this alternative action
